attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2020-0085

Date: 2020-02-29

Whereas the Honourable Michael F. Harrington, a judge of the Court of Appeal of Newfoundland and Labrador, has become afflicted with a permanent infirmity disabling him from the due execution of his office and has tendered his resignation;

 

Therefore, Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice,

 

(a) accepts the resignation of the Honourable Michael F. Harrington; and

 

(b) pursuant to paragraph 42(1.1)(b) of the Judges Act, grants to the Honourable Michael F. Harrington an annuity of $219,933.33, commencing on the day on which this Order in Council is made and continuing during his life.

 


 

Attendu que l’honorable Michael F. Harrington, juge de la Cour d’appel de Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador, a donné sa démission pour incapacité par suite d’une infirmité permanente,

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil :

 

a) accepte la démission de l’honorable Michael F. Harrington;

 

b) en vertu de l’alinéa 42(1.1)b) de la Loi sur les juges, accorde à l’honorable Michael F. Harrington, à titre viager, une pension annuelle de 219 933,33 $, payable à compter de la date de prise du présent décret.

Whereas the Honourable Michael F. Harrington, a judge of the Court of Appeal of Newfoundland and Labrador, has become afflicted with a permanent infirmity disabling him from the due execution of his office and has tendered his resignation;

(a) accepts the resignation of the Honourable Michael F. Harrington; and

 

(b) pursuant to paragraph 42(1.1)(b) of the Judges Act, grants to the Honourable Michael F. Harrington an annuity of $219,933.33, commencing on the day on which this Order in Council is made and continuing during his life.

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil :

 

a) accepte la démission de l’honorable Michael F. Harrington; 

 

b) en vertu de l’alinéa 42(1.1)b) de la Loi sur les juges, accorde à l’honorable Michael F. Harrington, à titre viager, une pension annuelle de 219 933,33 $, payable à compter de la date de prise du présent décret.
